title: Fan
description: A fan. A fan starts at a point or apex and extends in a specified list of directions from the apex. Each pair of directions forms a face of the fan extending to the specified radius.

show.description: Whether or not the fan is shown.

directions.description: The list of directions defining the fan.

radius.description: The radial limit of the fan. If `perDirectionRadius` is false, then this value is required.

perDirectionRadius.description: Whether the magnitude of each direction is used instead of a constant radius.

material.description: The material to display on the surface of the fan.

fill.description: Whether or not the fan is filled.

outline.description: Whether or not the fan is outlined.

outlineColor.description: The color of the fan outline.

outlineWidth.description: The width of the fan outline.

numberOfRings.description: The number of outline rings to draw, starting from the outer edge and equidistantly spaced towards the center.
